item.title: Tree overhanging footpath, 29th August
item.description:
Tree is located on privately owned land. Resident of 132 Abbotswood Road is concerned that the tree is in danger of falling onto footpath. The footpath is a route for children walking to school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road is raising and stopping water getting to manhole, 29th August
item.description:
Large puddles not draining even some time - see photo. Water puddles and pedestrians constantly being splashes. Road has raised and water not draining to manhole just up - see photo. Problem getting worse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 153, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Complaint, 29th August
item.description:
A435 closed due to cycle way completion. Pavement works with temporary traffic lights being carried out on diversion route - B4632 - causing long delays in Prestbury. Great planning !! Delays on 2 days this week - Weds and Thursday 27th and 28th Aug
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Cheltenham
